current_task: URGENT: Cloudflare tunnel down - intercord.stonefrog.com unreachable
blocked_on: Cloudflare tunnel container (interchord-tunnel) exited and needs restart
message: URGENT: The Cloudflare tunnel is down! User reported intercord.stonefrog.com showing ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED. Diagnosis: `podman ps -a | grep cloudflared` shows container 'interchord-tunnel' Exited (0) 2 hours ago. Please: 1) Start the tunnel: `podman start interchord-tunnel` 2) If that fails, check logs: `podman logs interchord-tunnel` 3) Ensure tunnel restarts on boot with restart policy 4) Verify site works after restart

context.likely_cause: Server reboot and tunnel container not set to restart automatically
